name: discordpremiumtoolkit
description: Easily handle the premium side of having a public Discord bot with DPT

scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run quickstart
scripts.clean-compile: rm -rf dist && tsc -b src --clean && npm run compile
scripts.migrate: npm run create-migrations && npm run apply-migrations
scripts.create-migrations: npm run compile && cd dist && npx mikro-orm migration:create
scripts.apply-migrations: npm run compile && cd dist && npx mikro-orm migration:up

author: Lily Bergonzat <lilybergonzat@gmail.com>
